values: 穿；穿着；穿戴；戴；戴着；穿破；磨损；磨成；消耗；损耗；耐用；耐穿；耐磨；持久；表现；显露；流露；面带；呈现（某种神态）；（水等）冲刷出；侵蚀出；消磨（时间）；使疲倦；使疲劳；使厌倦；渐渐过去；逐渐变化；经受考验；使形成特定习惯；使形成特定气质；变旧；变薄；变形；接受；容许（不赞成的事物）
服装；时装；衣着；穿着；穿戴；佩戴；穿戴物品；佩戴物品；磨损；损耗；耐磨性；耐用性；经久性；损耗量；使用量

synonym.mean: 服装，穿着；耐用性，耐久性；损耗

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 穿；磨损（wear的过去分词）；佩戴
磨损的；穿用的；令人疲倦的
可穿用的，可佩带的；耐用的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用语，指把衣服、鞋袜、帽子、手套等戴上去，侧重穿戴的动作。
普通用词，指给自己或他人穿衣。既表动作又可表状态。
最常用词，指穿衣、鞋袜或戴手套等，侧重穿戴的状态。

word_group.brief_definition: 磨损；流逝
面带微笑
时间流逝
磨损；穿破；耗尽
精疲力竭；穿破, 磨损
逐渐减弱, 逐渐消失
(正常使用造成的)磨损, 损耗, 损坏
开始变弱；变得不受欢迎；变得兴趣索然；失去说服力
(在婚姻等关系中)处于支配的位置, 起指挥的作用
让感情外露, 把心事挂在脸上
word_group.phrase: wear your heart on your sleeve

word_group.brief_definition: 穿着
战胜；克服
使自己精疲力竭
过于暴露感情、想法；过于直率
word_group.phrase: wear one's heart on one's sleeve

word_group.brief_definition: 穿破；用坏；耗尽；用尽；疲劳；厌倦
穿破；用坏；耗尽；用尽；疲劳；厌倦
战胜；克服
如果说得有理；就该接受
word_group.phrase: if the shoe fits, wear it

word_group.brief_definition: 耐磨性；耐磨性能；磨损耐磨性
耐磨；耐磨损；耐磨性

bilingual.source: Do you wear a uniform to school?

list.abstract: “wear”，英语单词。动词译为耐用，经用，耐磨，耐久，耐穿，经穿；名词译为磨损，损耗，磨坏，消耗，耗损。直接源自古英语的werian，意为：给……穿，穿上；最初源自原始日耳曼语的wazjanan，意为：给……提供……衣服。

yingyinNormal.en: Now I haven't got any shoes to wear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在我没有鞋穿了。

yingyinNormal.en: But wear one tomorrow though, okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是明天接着穿，好吗?

yingyinNormal.en: Why do you wear that thing, Dobby?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你为什么要穿那种东西，多比？
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, God. But, okay, what will you wear?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊。没关系，你要穿什么呢？

yingyinNormal.en: That's not the suit you wear to funerals?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不是你穿去葬礼的西装吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Ya ain't me! I would never wear that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不是我！我从来不会穿那种东西的！

yingyinNormal.en: Why not? I spilled grape juice. Well, wear different pajamas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？我把葡萄汁洒上了。那就穿别的睡裤啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Bye. Wear the black!
yingyinNormal.zh: 再见，穿黑的那件！

yingyinNormal.en: Look, Ross. Really. It's no big deal. You know. You wear a white coat. I wear a blue blazer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 罗斯，你听我说，这没啥大不了的啦，你穿白袍，我穿蓝色外套。

yingyinNormal.en: You wanna wear one kind of tights and then they're like, "No, wear these other kind of tights." Do I know you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是你就会想穿紧身衣然后他们说，不，穿别的样式的紧身衣。我认识你吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Well, why? I just said you should wear it. Well, I can't wear it now. I mean, I know you hate it. That's all I'm gonna be thinking about.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么？我都说了你可以穿。我现在不能穿了。我知道你讨厌它。这件事永远环绕在我脑海了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think that I'm gonna wear the boots tonight. Why not?
yingyinNormal.zh: 今晚我不想穿靴子。为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: I love this dress. How come I never see you wear it? 'Cause when I wear it, it's a shirt.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我好喜欢这条裙子，为啥从来没见你穿过呢？因为我一直把它当上衣穿。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, Sheldon. I'm not allowed to wear my Silver Surfer neck tie, but you can wear a bathrobe?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你来啦，谢尔顿。我想打银影侠的领带都不行，你却可以穿浴袍啊？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm coming to see you. I'm going to wear my nurse's outfit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我来看你吧，我要穿我的护士装啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Rach, come on, I'm not gonna wear any of this. Nothing silver. Okay, nothing with hair. And nothing with padlocks on it!
yingyinNormal.zh: 别，我才不穿银色的，有毛毛领的，更不穿带挂锁的。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes. And I know what looks sexy on guys, please. Just wear what I suggest, and she is gonna go nuts for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我知道男人穿什么最性感，穿我推荐的衣服，不迷死她才怪。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't eat veal. I can't wear fur. I can't go hunting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能吃小牛肉，我不能穿皮草，我不能去打猎。

yingyinNormal.en: Here, you can all find something to wear in the dressing-up box.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里，你可以在服装盒里找一些东西来穿。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, Pheebs, quick, what shoes should I wear? The black or the purple?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我该穿哪一双鞋？黑色的还是紫色的？

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 疲劳的；疲倦的；厌倦的；不耐烦的；使人疲劳的；令人厌烦的；沉闷乏味的

word_family.mean: v. 穿着；戴着；佩着；穿破；穿旧；销蚀；磨损；耐用；耐久；耐穿；耐磨；使（船头）转向下风

sense_info_list.en: habitually have on one's body or be dressed in

examination_example.sentence: It is deeply uncomfortable – it's the emotional equivalent of <highlight>wearing</highlight> a jacket weighted with stones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是非常不舒服的——在情感上就像穿着一件镶有石头的夹克一样沉重。

examination_example.sentence: The point of a style upgrade isn't to become more vain or to spend more time fussing over what to <highlight>wear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 风格升级的意义不在于变得更虚荣，也不在于花更多时间讨论穿什么。

examination_example.sentence: What's more, both boys and girls <highlight>wore</highlight> what were thought of as gender-neutral dresses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，男孩和女孩都穿着人们认为是中性的服装。

sense_info_list.en: clothing for a particular group or for a particular occasion

examination_example.sentence: Focus on infant <highlight>wear</highlight> and older kids' clothes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关注婴儿服装和大龄儿童服装。

examination_example.sentence: In order to increase sales, they should create a "third stepping stone" between infant <highlight>wear</highlight> and older kids' clothes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了增加销售额，他们应该在婴儿服装和大龄儿童服装之间创造“第三过渡阶段”。

examination_example.sentence: Yet satisfaction with these material purchases <highlight>wears</highlight> off fairly quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，这些物质购买带来的满足感很快就消失了。

sense_info_list.en: damage, waste, or produce by continued use or friction
exhibit or present a particular facial expression or appearance
have one's hair or beard at a specified length or arranged in a specified style
pass a period of time in some activity

word_usage.usage:
表示“衣服、服装”
wear指某种用途或场合穿的衣服，尤指于商店售卖的衣服，infant wear童装。
clothes指普通的衣物、服装，new clothes新衣服。
clothing指衣服，尤指某种类型的服装，warm clothing保暖服。
dress指着装、衣着，尤指某种样式或某种场合穿的衣服，a wedding dress婚纱。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 疲劳的；疲倦的；厌倦的；不耐烦的；使人疲劳的；令人厌烦的；沉闷乏味的
n. 穿用者；佩带者；穿戴者

word_family.mean: v. 穿着；戴着；佩着；穿破；穿旧；销蚀；磨损；耐用；耐久；耐穿；耐磨；使（船头）转向下风

sense_info_list.en: damage, waste, or produce by continued use or friction
habitually have on one's body or be dressed in

examination_example.sentence: They know I'm a vegetarian, that I don't <highlight>wear</highlight> leather or fur, and that I always use public transportation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们知道我是素食主义者，我不穿皮革或毛皮，而且我总是乘坐公共交通工具。

examination_example.sentence: American designers prized resourcefulness and the freedom of women who <highlight>wore</highlight> the clothing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国设计师非常重视穿衣服的女性的智慧和自由。

examination_example.sentence: Fashion in America was logical and answerable to the will of the women who <highlight>wore</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国，时尚是合乎逻辑的并且对穿着它的女性的意愿负责。

word_usage.usage:
wear和put on都有“穿”的意思，前者是表示状态或动作意义不强的持续性动词，强调状态；后者表示瞬间的动作，强调动作。
早晨我一起床就穿衣服。
误 I wear my clothes as soon as I get out of bed in the morning.
正 I put on my clothes as soon as I get out of bed in the morning.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 疲劳的；疲倦的；厌倦的；不耐烦的；使人疲劳的；令人厌烦的；沉闷乏味的
adj. 用旧的；用坏的；疲惫的；筋疲力尽的

word_family.mean: v. 穿着；戴着；佩着；穿破；穿旧；销蚀；磨损；耐用；耐久；耐穿；耐磨；使（船头）转向下风

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (正常使用造成的)磨损；损耗；损坏

sense_info_list.en: habitually have on one's body or be dressed in

examination_example.sentence: The dog is six and a half years old and was last seen <highlight>wearing</highlight> a red collar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这只狗六岁半，最后一次被看见时戴着红领。

examination_example.sentence: Get outside, stretch your legs, do something cultural, buy yourself something tasty to eat or something pretty to <highlight>wear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 出去走走，伸伸腿，做些有文化的事情，给自己买些好吃的或者好看的衣服。

examination_example.sentence: His parents <highlight>wore</highlight> caps and gowns.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的父母穿戴着学士帽和学士服。

sense_info_list.en: damage; waste; or produce by continued use or friction

examination_example.sentence: And they can also hide dirt and <highlight>wear</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且它们还能隐藏污垢和磨损。

examination_example.sentence: They must endure <highlight>wear</highlight> and tear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们必须耐得住磨损。

word_usage.usage:
wear和put on都有“穿”的意思，前者是表示状态或动作意义不强的持续性动词，强调状态；后者表示瞬间的动作，强调动作。
早晨我一起床就穿衣服。
误 I wear my clothes as soon as I get out of bed in the morning.
正 I put on my clothes as soon as I get out of bed in the morning.

exam_freq_info.chinese: 磨损; 消耗; 用旧

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 用旧的；用坏的；疲惫的；筋疲力尽的

word_family.mean: v. 穿着；戴着；佩着；穿破；穿旧；销蚀；磨损；耐用；耐久；耐穿；耐磨；使（船头）转向下风

examination_example.sentence: But in half the cases she <highlight>wore</highlight> a specially designed fat suit which increased her weight to 180 pounds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在一半的情况下，她都穿着特别设计的肥胖服，体重增加到180磅。

examination_example.sentence: First of all, you must <highlight>wear</highlight> shoes that cover your feet in the lab.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，在实验室里，你必须穿能盖住脚的鞋子。

examination_example.sentence: I showed them I was independent by <highlight>wearing</highlight> strange clothes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我通过穿着奇怪的衣服向他们展示我的独立性。

sense_info_list.zh: 磨损; 消耗; 用旧

examination_example.sentence: As the night <highlight>wore</highlight> on, people began to close their eyes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着夜幕降临，人们开始闭上眼睛。

examination_example.sentence: The uncertainty was starting to <highlight>wear</highlight> on us, so I wanted to do something special.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种不确定性开始笼罩着我们，所以我想做一些特别的事情。

examination_example.sentence: Funny complaints can <highlight>wear</highlight> people out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可笑的抱怨会让人精疲力竭。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 可穿用的；可佩带的
adj. 用旧的；用坏的；疲惫的；筋疲力尽的
n. 穿用者；佩带者；穿戴者

word_family.mean: v. 穿着；戴着；佩着；穿破；穿旧；销蚀；磨损；耐用；耐久；耐穿；耐磨；使（船头）转向下风

sense_info_list.en: habitually have on one's body or be dressed in

examination_example.sentence: It's necessary for us to <highlight>wear</highlight> masks (口罩) in public places during the COVID-19 period.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在新冠肺炎期间, 我们有必要在公共场所戴口罩。

examination_example.sentence: So he has to <highlight>wear</highlight> hearing aids.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以他必须佩戴助听器。

examination_example.sentence: Kids who don't know how to swim should <highlight>wear</highlight> life jackets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不懂游泳的孩子应该穿救生衣。

sense_info_list.en: exhibit or present a particular facial expression or appearance

examination_example.sentence: My English teacher always <highlight>wears</highlight> a sweet smile in class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的英语老师在课堂上总是带着甜美的微笑。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Wearing</highlight> a smile.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 露出微笑。

sense_info_list.en: damage, waste, or produce by continued use or friction

examination_example.sentence: Over millions of years, the Colorado River <highlight>wore</highlight> away rocks as it passed through the area．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百万年来，科罗拉多河流经该地区，岩石逐渐磨损。

sense_info_list.en: have one's hair or beard at a specified length or arranged in a specified style

examination_example.sentence: Also, he used to <highlight>wear</highlight> long hair and have an untidy lab.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另外，他以前留长头发，实验室也不整洁。

word_usage.usage:
wear和put on都有“穿”的意思，前者是表示状态或动作意义不强的持续性动词，强调状态；后者表示瞬间的动作，强调动作。
早晨我一起床就穿衣服。
误 I wear my clothes as soon as I get out of bed in the morning.
正 I put on my clothes as soon as I get out of bed in the morning.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最常用词，指穿衣、鞋袜或戴手套等，侧重穿戴的状态。
普通用词，指给自己或他人穿衣，既可表动作又可表状态。
